Name: Tower Fortress
About the game: A mysterious tower has risen! It emits plumes of noxious green smoke from its summit making people sick. Strange creatures infest the tower but if nobody tries to ascend it we will all be doomed! Are you that hero?..... FEATURES: Randomised for replay. Every run is different! Evolve your abilities and skill to progress ever further up the tower!. 4 Themed zones to ascend! Unique hazards and monsters to each zone! 4 Epic End Zone Boss Fights! Loads of Gun Types including, Laser, T Gun, Bubble Gun and Shotgun! 25 Suits to unlock each with unique abilities that affect play. Upgrade yourself at the end of each level with 20 upgrade abilities!
